position: Investment Banking Associate at Soonicorn Ventures || CA Finalist || Co-Founder (Apurbo Kitchen Corner) || Post Graduated || Finance & Stock Market Enthusiast.

experience.title: Investment Banking Associate
experience.description: Soonicorn Ventures (SV) is a Startup Investment Tech Platform. Its an invite only community of Early stage VC Funds, Private Equity Funds, Family Offices, Angel Funds, Angel Networks, Accelerators, HNIs and startups. SV provides investors access to pre-screened startup deals with an option to co-invest with their other investors. Startups can create their online profile to network with investors to raise funds.With the hybrid (Online & Offline) approach of engagement, SV focuses on retaining the personal touch while assisting in closing deals digitally. SV teams also helps in deal related affairs like Due Diligence, Valuation, Legal Documents and Portfolio Management. SV team is formed of Investment Bankers and Analysts holding an extensive experience in managing buy side and sell side deals globally. Invest | Raise Funds | Invest

experience.title: Article Assistant
experience.description: Nucleus Advisors is an Investment Banking and Risk Advisory firm devised to help growing businesses. Nucleus works closely with SMEs, Startups, Unlisted and Listed entities. Team is highly determined, focused, swift and responsible. Team has a diversified experience across industry and speaks a language of business owners. Most importantly, team is young at heart!

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: ➡️A start up cloud Kitchen business tied up with swiggy and zomato and intially started with serving north Indian cuisines.Roles & Responsibilities :- ▶️Initiating the idea of Startup Cloud Kitchen Business as a Co-founder.▶️Preparing and Presenting books of accounts. ▶️Providing managerial and financial services such as Costing, Budgeting and Marketing. ▶️Filing monthly GSTR returns (GSTR 1&3B) and ITR Returns of Individuals. ▶️Presentation skills and building relationship with vendors and customers effectively. ▶️Looked after the company policy and procedures.▶️Ensuring high standards of customer services.
